name: Avoid JMS Synchronous Activities (TIBCO BW)
description:
This rule searches for ProcessActivities of type JMSQueueSignalInActivity, JMSQueueRequestReplyActivity or JMSTopicRequestReplyActivity.
ProcessActivity is a property captured in the metamodel.
output:
This report lists all  Processe Activities of type JMS JMSQueueSignalInActivity, JMSQueueRequestReplyActivity and JMSTopicRequestReplyActivity.
It provides the following information:
Process Activity full name.
The associated value is the activityType.
rationale: Blocking calls can result in system failure if the called process fails. JMS Synchronous activities are inefficient for scalability.

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - Memory, Network and Disk Space Management
